column1: Table 2. Soil Bulk Density, pH, Effective Cation Exchange Capacity (ECEC), Base Saturation (BS), N, C, and $^{13}$C Concentrations for A the Kamae Site, B the Chinchuck Site, C the Lajas Site, and D the Toa Baja Site. Standard deviations are provided where applicable. At the Kamae site, one *Eucalyptus* plot is excluded from analysis due to the predominance of rock in the last 20 cm of the 0—40-cm soil core. a Data from @Garcia-Montiel1998. Data were measured from the surface 20 cm of soil when the plantation was 12 years old. b Data from @Wang1991. Data were measured from the top 3 cm of soil when the plantation was 5.5 years old. c Base saturation was calculated as the sum of the basic cations Ca$^{2+}$, Mg$^{2+}$, K$^+$, and Na$^+$ divided by the CEC. d Data from @Parrotta1999. Data were measured from the surface 20 cm of soil when the plantation was 7.5 years old. e Base saturation was calculated as the sum of the basic cations Ca$^{2+}$, Mg$^{2+}$, K$^+$, and Na$^+$ divided by the CEC from @Parrotta1999 and Parrotta Unpublished. Data were measured when the plantation was 7.5 years old.
